title: Power of the Union to confer powers, etc., on States in certain cases
text:
13 June 1949
. It empowered the Union Executive and Union Legislature to confer their respective federal powers, duties and functions on the State Governments and its officers.
There was no debate around Draft Article 235.
It was adopted without any debate on
13 June 1949
.
